name: San Goku Shi 12 with Power-Up Kit
name_original: San Goku Shi 12 with Power-Up Kit
description:
San Goku Shi 12 with Power-Up Kit is a strategy game developed by Koei Tecmo. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by Koei Tecmo Games.
San Goku Shi 12 with Power-Up Kit is available on PS Vita.
